20101227064051.000|20101227064055.000|CC1|          FROM NETFLIX.         
20101227064055.000|20101227064055.000|CC1|  [ Carol ] THIS COULD TURN ME  
20101227064055.000|20101227064112.000|CC1|      INTO A HISTORY BUFF.      
20101227064112.000|20101227064430.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20101227064112.000|20101227064113.000|CC1|       COPD makes it hard       
20101227064113.000|20101227064115.000|CC1|       for me to breathe.       
20101227064115.000|20101227064115.000|CC1|        But with ADVAIR,        
20101227064115.000|20101227064117.000|CC1|      I'm breathing better.     
20101227064117.000|20101227064117.000|CC1| So now, I can join the fun and 
20101227064117.000|20101227064121.000|CC1|  games with my grandchildren.  
20101227064121.000|20101227064123.000|CC1|           Great news!          
20101227064123.000|20101227064123.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101227064123.000|20101227064125.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchitis, 
20101227064125.000|20101227064127.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101227064127.000|20101227064127.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101227064127.000|20101227064130.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101227064130.000|20101227064131.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101227064131.000|20101227064131.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101227064131.000|20101227064134.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101227064134.000|20101227064134.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101227064134.000|20101227064136.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101227064136.000|20101227064136.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101227064136.000|20101227064138.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101227064138.000|20101227064138.000|CC1|        working together        
20101227064138.000|20101227064140.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101227064140.000|20101227064140.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101227064140.000|20101227064144.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101227064144.000|20101227064144.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101227064144.000|20101227064146.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101227064146.000|20101227064148.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101227064148.000|20101227064148.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101227064148.000|20101227064150.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101227064150.000|20101227064150.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase      
20101227064150.000|20101227064152.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis   
20101227064152.000|20101227064153.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20101227064153.000|20101227064153.000|CC1|        Tell your doctor        
20101227064153.000|20101227064155.000|CC1|  if you have a heart condition 
20101227064155.000|20101227064155.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20101227064155.000|20101227064157.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.     
20101227064157.000|20101227064159.000|CC1|    I had fun today, Grandpa.   
20101227064159.000|20101227064202.000|CC1|                You and me both.
20101227064202.000|20101227064202.000|CC1|   If COPD is still making it   
20101227064202.000|20101227064204.000|CC1|        hard to breathe,        
20101227064204.000|20101227064204.000|CC1|         ask your doctor

20101227064205.000|20101227064205.000|CC1|   will help improve your lung
